title: Need a region Transfer, but can't access legacy client
body:
Hey-o

Just moved to London for a year -work- (from Australia), and as an ex-NA player I thought I'd take the opportunity to re-join it instead of EU West, to play with some old buddies from before my transfer.

Problem is it seems region transfer isn't in the new client.
Second problem is although it reportedly works fine in legacy client, it is asking for a 1gb patch, which I just do not have the mobile data to do. The 4g network is super fast and stable, but I can't afford the 1gb hit to my data cap.

This is a temporary issue. Once we get wi-fi in a week, and/or my bank account is created and I can sign up for a better mobile plan with more data, this won't be an issue.

In the meantime however, I just want to play league :(

Is there nothing that can be done!?

Cheers,
Brodie

replies.body:
How are you returning to the legacy client?  It's using the same files as the updated client so nothing needs to update.  You should be able to access the legacy client this way:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if that solves this issue!

Hi There!

I've just tried...

* Launching the legacy client, using the "Launch Legacy Client" text in the bottom-right corner of the new client.

* Launched using the lol.launcher.exe , as well as using the lol.launcher.admin.exe , in the "League of Legends" Folder.

Both of these result in my needing to download an 850+mb patch [http://puu.sh/ssLIp.jpg]

However, Launching the new client lets me straight in; ready to play a game, chat with friends, etc.


I recently transferred my league of legends folder from an external HDD, to my laptop's SSD, if this could possibly influence anything requiring specific directories or the like?

If there's any additional information I can provide, please let me know :)

Thank you for your assistance.
